name: Hungry Cyclops
description:
This is a casual game in which you feed a cute pet cyclops to make it grow as big as possible.

- W, S, A, D (up, down, left, right arrows): Move character (wizard)

- Left mouse click: Fire magic in the direction of the cursor

- When magic hits an enemy, it becomes food.

-When the Cyclops hits food, it eats it and grows bigger, and its Stomach gauge increases a little.

-When the Cyclops grows bigger, the earth shakes more each time it walks

-When the wizard is hit by an enemy, his life is reduced by one.

-The game is over when the life gauge reaches zero.

-When the Stomach Gauge (Cyclops' satiety level) reaches 0, the game is over.

Have fun!
